title: Vim Cheatsheet
description: Complete Vim reference from basics to advanced. Includes modes, movement, editing, text objects, macros, and a ready-to-use config.
author: Anish Karki

title: Terraform Cheatsheet
description: Complete Terraform reference covering providers, resources, variables, modules, state management, loops, functions, and best practices.
author: Anish Karki

title: Python Programming Cheatsheet
description: Comprehensive Python reference covering data types, control structures, functions, OOP, and commonly used libraries.
author: Anish Karki

title: Visual Studio Code Ultimate Cheatsheet
description: The definitive guide to VS Code shortcuts for Windows. Boost your productivity with essential commands for editing, navigation, debugging, and terminal usage.
author: Anish Karki

title: Git Essentials Cheatsheet
description: A practical Git reference for version control mastery. Covers setup, branching, merging, conflict resolution, inspection, and advanced history rewriting.
author: Anish Karki

title: Command Line & Bash Cheatsheet
description: Essential command line shortcuts and Bash tricks for improved productivity. Includes readline shortcuts, file management, and powerful Sed/Awk data processing examples.
author: Anish Karki

title: Sed Cheatsheet
description: A comprehensive guide to `sed`, including basic substitution, advanced pattern matching using regex, flow control, and powerful one-liners for text processing.
author: Anish Karki

title: Awk Cheatsheet
description: A comprehensive guide to `awk`, covering basic field extraction, filtering, math, formatting, and advanced text processing. Organized by difficulty.
author: Anish Karki
